casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Geraldo TORRES Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 4, 2017

Lauren Weisfeld, chief of legal services, in support of the petition.

Toni M. Smith-Rosario, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 901, 159 A.3d 1204 (2017), is denied.
